info.author: Jonas Eschle, Albert Puig, Rafael Silva Coutinho, Matthieu Marinangeli
info.description:
========
Overview
========



zfit model fitting interface for HEP

* Free software: BSD 3-Clause License

Installation
============

::

    pip install zfit-interface

You can also install the in-development version with::

    pip install https://github.com/zfit/zfit-interface/archive/master.zip


Documentation
=============


https://zfit-interface.readthedocs.io/


Development
===========

To run the all tests run::

    tox

Note, to combine the coverage data from all the tox environments run:

.. list-table::
    :widths: 10 90
    :stub-columns: 1

    - - Windows
      - ::

            set PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append
            tox

    - - Other
      - ::

            PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append tox


Changelog
=========

0.0.1 (2019-11-05)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
